venue.name: Bear and Grill Restaurants in Orange

item.description:
Roxy Perry and her band maybe even Billy from "Billy and the Showmen" (singing professionally for 45 years+) will be at the Orange Bear and Grill every Wednesday playing music up a storm!.  Her band played at the Montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland.  Roxy has been playing music on stages since she was nine.  http://www.roxyperry.com/gigs/biography.htm

This is a fantastic dance night on hump day.  The band goes on at 8-11:30.  I will be there after 8:30 due to a work function that evening.  I will have to miss a portion of their music to my regret.

Roxy would rather not have wall flowers so if you want to dance, come out and PARTY! They do encourage anyone that can play in a band to join them.  Eldin from the Bernadettes was there to sing some numbers on 4/3.  He may be there again.  Requests are welcome.

I know it's a Wednesday, but what else is going on for a hump day.

 

Ciao,

The Ambassador!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Dance Party at the Bear and Grill, Orange
